summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Agatha Christie's Ordeal By Innocence
Review Date: 2019/11/01
Categories: Suspense, Drama
Product Description: ['When wealthy philanthropist, Rachel Argyll, is murdered at her family estate, her adopted son Jack is arrested for her murder. He vehemently protests his guilt and eighteen months later, the identity of the murder is thrown in doubt. Now it is up to the rest of the family to decipher a killer amongst them.']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sandra Goldbacher'], 'Producers': ['Roopesk Parekh'], 'Starring': ['Bill Nighy', 'Anthony Boyle', 'Anna Chancellor']}
Review Text: Superb. I haven't read the book, but I don't care. This presentation was excellent!!
Review Title: Absolutely superb!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Tomorrow War
Review Date: 2021/07/04
Categories: Suspense, Drama, Compelling, Frightening
Product Description: ['Time travelers arrive from 2051 to deliver an urgent message: 30 years in the future mankind is losing a war against a deadly alien species. The only hope for survival is for soldiers and civilians to be transported to the future and join the fight. Determined to save the world for his daughter, Dan Forester teams up with a brilliant scientist and his estranged father to rewrite the planet’s fate.']
Average Rating: 4.1

Review Title: Excellent movie!
Rating: 5.0

Product Title: Annika
Review Date: 2022/05/12
Categories: Suspense, Drama

Review Title: Absolutely superb!

Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for suspenseful and dramatic narratives, consistently favoring high-quality productions across multiple reviews. They rate products mostly above 4.0, indicating a tendency to appreciate engaging stories with complex characters and well-crafted plots. The common themes revolve around murder mysteries, police dramas, and science fiction, suggesting an attraction to intellectually stimulating content that involves problem-solving and intrigue. 

Quality resonates strongly in their choices, as they frequently commend the overall presentation and execution of these narratives, indicating a low tolerance for poorly made productions, while exhibiting moderate price sensitivity. The individual also shows a preference for diverse audio options and subtitles, suggesting an inclusivity in their viewing habits, likely valuing accessibility. Overall, the core preferences lie in immersive, thought-provoking stories with strong character development and high production values, alongside a willingness to explore varied themes within the drama and suspense genres.

target_interaction.title: Pleasant and fun
target_interaction.text: This is so pleasant and fun to watch. The chemistry between Joan and Darby is so sweet.  Bryan Brown and Greta Scacchi are perfectly cast ( I have always *loved* Bryan Brown!). The mystery around the main characters is fascinating as it unfolds and I like the twists in the per-episode stories.  This is a welcome respite from violent, psychological thrillers. At least I sleep well at night! And... the Australian scenery is absolutely gorgeous!
